statement: Let $G$ be a group such that the stable commutator length vanishes on $[G, G]$ and assume ${\ell}: G \to {\mathbb{R}}$ satisfies and . Then there exist a real Banach space $\mathbb{B} = (\mathbb{B},\| \, \|)$ and a group homomorphism $\phi : G \to \mathbb{B}$ such that ${\ell}$ is equivalent to $x\mapsto \| \phi(x) \|$.
